replies.msg:
求教, 上網搵到呢個網既CODE,但係COPY落去開冇反應, 有冇人知應該點改?
https://www.extendoffice.com/zh-TW/documents/outlook/5044-outlook-insert-recipient-name-in-message.html
因為我一日要SEND百幾封EMAIL, 成日打HI .., Dear.., 打到傻同好唔就手,,所以想擺個VBA入個SHORTCUT到 按一下就得

我宜家用緊最蠢既方法就係 SET最常用既名算
Sub InsertTextKelly()
Const sText As String = "Hi Kelly,"
On Error GoTo ErrHandler
If TypeName(ActiveWindow) = "Inspector" Then
If ActiveInspector.IsWordMail And ActiveInspector.EditorType = olEditorWord Then
ActiveInspector.WordEditor.Application.Selection.TypeText sText
End If
End If
Exit Sub
ErrHandler:
Beep
End Sub
